data.title: Dr. Wright: Woke History Thanksgiving Podcast
data.meta_description: This Land is Their Land: Wampanoag Indians, Plymouth Colony and Troubled History of Thanksgiving
data.text:
Dr. Joshua Wright, Trinity associate professor of global affairs, hosts a podcast, Woke History, available on the NPR One app and WESM-FM radio. Just in time for Thanksgiving, Dr. Wright’s newest podcast features his interview with Dr. David J. Silverman, George Washington University professor and author of “This Land is Their Land: The Wampanoag Indians, Plymouth Colony, and the Troubled History of Thanksgiving.”

Listen on:

NPR One

NPR Podcasts

WESM-FM

Media Contact: Ann Pauley, Media Relations, pauleya@trinitydc.edu
